들짐승 중에 가장: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='g1a' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g2a' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='g3a' x1='50%' y1='0%' x2='50%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient><filter id='glow1'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow1'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='20'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.3'/></feComponentTransfer><feMerge><feMergeNode/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='150' rx='80' ry='35' fill='url(#g1a)' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#shadow1)'/><path d='M 60 80 Q 50 100 60 120 Q 70 140 90 145 Q 110 140 120 120 Q 130 100 120 80 Q 110 60 90 55 Q 70 60 60 80 Z' fill='url(#g2a)' filter='url(#glow1)'/><ellipse cx='80' cy='90' rx='8' ry='12' fill='url(#g3a)' opacity='0.8'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='90' rx='8' ry='12' fill='url(#g3a)' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M 70 110 Q 90 120 110 110' stroke='url(#g1a)' stroke-width='3' fill='none' opacity='0.7' stroke-linecap='round'/><path d='M 50 70 Q 40 60 35 55' stroke='url(#g2a)' stroke-width='4' fill='none' opacity='0.6' stroke-linecap='round'/><path d='M 130 70 Q 140 60 145 55' stroke='url(#g2a)' stroke-width='4' fill='none' opacity='0.6' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
